metadata.title: CVE-2014-9031 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the wptexturize function inWordPress before 3.7.5, 3.8.x before 3.8.5, and 3.9.x before 3.9.3 allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via crafted use ofshortcode brackets in a text field, as demonstrated by a comment or a post.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9031` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.0.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.0.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfifteen - 4.0.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.0.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.0.1+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.1+dfsg-1').
